title: ABBYY FineReader 11.0.102.583 Professional Edition Final (2012)
description:
ABBYY FineReader 11.0.102.583 Professional Edition Final (2012) [Multilengual]

English:

On the file:
Operating systems: XP, Vista, 7
Language: Multi / Russian
Activation: Present
File Size: 380.44 MB

ABBYY FineReader 11 Professional Edition - software for text recognition that allows you to convert images of documents and any type of PDF-files into electronic editable formats.
The new version provides high recognition accuracy, identifying and restoring the "logical" structure of the document in its electronic copy, and lets you forget about reprinting text.
The new version recognizes excellent images of poor quality: faxes, pictures taken with camera phones. The program improved mechanisms for determining the structure of the document, including: finding the tables, pictures, graphs.

As the developer, in version 11 to 45% faster processing. The new black and white mode for processing of business documents and books can get an electronic document to 30% faster than the processing of images in full color. In addition, the program improved opportunities for the conservation design multi-page documents. Also in ABBYY FineReader 11 expanded the list of recognized languages, including added support for Arabic, and improved the quality of document recognition, digital camera or mobile phone.

Recognition accuracy and format the document retention
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ When converting paper documents into electronic format ABBYY FineReader 11 retains the appearance of the document and its structure, including the location of the text, tables, images, content, headers and page numbering.

Recognition of digital images
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Get a picture of text you can use the scanner, MFP, a camera or camera phone. The new version of ABBYY FineReader recognizes text in the image, convert it and store in a convenient format for you.

High accuracy and speed of document conversion
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ With unsurpassed precision program recognizes your scanned or photographed documents, converting them into editable electronic PDF and a text layer, and a search. The new black-and-white document processing is faster by 30% compared with the recognition of color images, which also saves up to 70% of hard drive space.

Improved conversion of PDF files into editable formats
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The program converts any type of PDF-files to PDF and PDF / A with search capability, which is especially useful when creating electronic archives. Supported by the security settings for PDF.

Improved interface to increase productivity
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ New Style Editor will format the documents directly to the ABBYY FineReader 11. Users can browse all the styles used in the document, modify, or merge them. Changes are automatically applied to the whole document, thus eliminating the manual adjustment. Improved scanning of the result of recognition can quickly correct errors in the text.

Freedom of retyping and reformatting documents
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Thanks to technology, Advanced Document Recognition Technology (ADRT) ABBYY FineReader 11 beautifully preserves the original structure of the multi-page documents, including the layout of text, tables, headers, footers, footnotes, page numbers, contents, tables of contents, etc.

Supporting a wide range of formats to save the results
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The program supports a variety of formats for saving documents that you need to work. You will be able to write the results to a file or send them directly into the application Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Adobe Acrobat, WordPerfect, OpenOffice.org Writer, etc.

Tools for image processing of documents
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved image editor includes a complete set of tools for preprocessing images of documents received from the camera or mobile camera device. Users can adjust the brightness and contrast of images, intensity levels of light and shadow, correct distortions that are typical for shooting with a digital camera.

Create e-books in popular formats fb2, ePub
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The program supports the preservation of the most popular e-book formats (fb2, ePub, etc.), it will quickly make a digital copy for portable devices - book-reader, tablet, smartphone, etc.

Support for 188 world languages
11 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ ABBYY FineReader recognizes documents on 188 languages. The version adds new recognition languages.
